name: Lost Light (TwoBeerGames)
description:
This game has been inspired by the band STARSET. They released an animated music video for their song "ECHO" which is the universe this game plays in.

You play that little ECHO unit that is supposed to become the new energy source of a light beacon - a big monument on the planet.

Finding a way through the desert is your main objective in this tiny open-world. You have to make use of your light in order to traverse obstacles and eventually fulfill your purpose.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: 

At least a dedicated GPU!
